content: Krpa niranya mariyame! Ninakku samaadhaanam / nyangallude kartthaavu ninnodukoode, / nee sthreekallil vaazhtthappettavallaakunnu. / Ninte udaraphalamaaya / nyangallude kartthaaveshumishihaa vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu. / Daivamaathaavaaya vishuddha kanyakamartthamariyame! / Thampuraante amme / paapikallaaya nyangallkku vendi ippozhum eppozhum / nyangallude maranasamayatthum / Daivam thampuraanodu apekshichukollllaname. Aammeen.
